languages.text: "Вы напомнили мне: надо поблагодарить Лорд-капитана за то, что я не чахну за бумажной работой, как другие офицеры".

traits.locale_text: "Вы напомнили мне: надо поблагодарить Лорд-капитана за то, что я не чахну за бумажной работой, как другие офицеры".

languages.text: "That reminds me: I should thank the Lord Captain for not letting me waste away doing paperwork like so many other officers."
languages.original_text: "Вы напомнили мне: надо поблагодарить Лорд-капитана за то, что я не чахну за бумажной работой, как другие офицеры".

traits.locale_text: "That reminds me: I should thank the Lord Captain for not letting me waste away doing paperwork like so many other officers."
"That reminds me: I should thank the Lord Captain for not letting me waste away doing paperwork like so many other officers."

"That reminds me: I should thank the Lord Captain for not letting me waste away doing paperwork like so many other officers."
"That reminds me: I should thank the Lord Captain for not letting me waste away doing paperwork like so many other officers."

languages.text: 「その言葉で思い出しました。他の士官のように書類仕事でくたびれ果てずに済んだのは、ロード・キャプテンのおかげです。感謝しないといけませんね」
languages.original_text: "That reminds me: I should thank the Lord Captain for not letting me waste away doing paperwork like so many other officers."

traits.locale_text: 「その言葉で思い出しました。他の士官のように書類仕事でくたびれ果てずに済んだのは、ロード・キャプテンのおかげです。感謝しないといけませんね」

languages.text: "Da fällt mir ein: Ich sollte dem Lord Captain danken, dass ich mein Leben nicht mit Papierkram vergeuden muss, wie so viele andere Offiziere."
languages.original_text: "That reminds me: I should thank the Lord Captain for not letting me waste away doing paperwork like so many other officers."

traits.locale_text: "Da fällt mir ein: Ich sollte dem Lord Captain danken, dass ich mein Leben nicht mit Papierkram vergeuden muss, wie so viele andere Offiziere."

languages.text: « À propos, je devrais remercier {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} de ne pas m'obliger à dépérir derrière un bureau comme de nombreux officiers. »
languages.original_text: "That reminds me: I should thank the Lord Captain for not letting me waste away doing paperwork like so many other officers."

traits.locale_text: « À propos, je devrais remercier {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} de ne pas m'obliger à dépérir derrière un bureau comme de nombreux officiers. »

languages.text: «Eso me recuerda que debería dar gracias {mf|al|a la} Lord Capitán por no dejar que me pudra rellenando papeleo como cualquier mero funcionario».
languages.original_text: "That reminds me: I should thank the Lord Captain for not letting me waste away doing paperwork like so many other officers."

traits.locale_text: «Eso me recuerda que debería dar gracias {mf|al|a la} Lord Capitán por no dejar que me pudra rellenando papeleo como cualquier mero funcionario».

languages.text: “这倒是提醒我了。我应该感谢舰长大人，{mf|他|她}没有让我像很多其他军官那样，把时间浪费在文书工作上。”
languages.original_text: "That reminds me: I should thank the Lord Captain for not letting me waste away doing paperwork like so many other officers."

traits.locale_text: “这倒是提醒我了。我应该感谢舰长大人，{mf|他|她}没有让我像很多其他军官那样，把时间浪费在文书工作上。”

languages.text: "Diğer subaylar gibi evrak işine gömülerek çürümeme izin vermediği için Lord Kaptan'a teşekkür borcum var."
languages.original_text: "That reminds me: I should thank the Lord Captain for not letting me waste away doing paperwork like so many other officers."

traits.locale_text: "Diğer subaylar gibi evrak işine gömülerek çürümeme izin vermediği için Lord Kaptan'a teşekkür borcum var."

languages.original_text: "That reminds me: I should thank the Lord Captain for not letting me waste away doing paperwork like so many other officers."
